channel.title: 🏢 Model Evaluation & Threat Research (METR) on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Model Evaluation & Threat Research (METR) on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Measuring AI Ability to Complete Long Tasks
item.description: AI progress is tracked with a new metric, 50%-task-completion time horizon, showing exponential growth with a doubling time of ~7 months, hinting at significant automation potential in the near future…
